author: Nerdstalgic
description:
Ben Stiller is best known for his legendary comedy career—with unforgettable performances in Zoolander, Meet the Parents, Tropic Thunder, and There’s Something About Mary. But in recent years, Ben Stiller redefined himself as a powerhouse director and producer—especially with the critically acclaimed Apple TV+ thriller Severance.  

From Blue Steel to Bleak Corporate Dystopia, Ben Stiller’s creative journey is one of Hollywood’s most fascinating transformations.

#benstiller #severance #zoolander #tropicthunder #nerdstalgic
title: Why Did Comedy's Biggest Star Stop Making Comedies?
